item.title: UBER
item.description: score:-88 Chances: Uber has finally turned a corner, and the competition can’t keep up. As fellow industry pioneers Nvidia, Meta and Uber earns spots on IBD Leaderboard, Spotfify stock tunes up a new breakout move. Risks: Uber said on Friday it had filed a legal appeal against the Paris mayor’s office regarding restrictions placed upon so-called VTCs, tourist vehicles with drivers, in the capital.
